title: Synthesis of nano-SiO2@PTPEG–VPA copolymer and its effects on early-age cement hydration

Lei Dong, Xin Shu, Qianping Ran
Heat flows of cement hydration with the addition of 0.8 wt% pristine NS and NS@PTPEG–VPA, and corresponding schematic illustration of the seeding effects jointly determined by agglomeration degree and pozzolanic reactivity of NS@PTPEG–VPA.
